errors.error_description: Added apt-get command for installing dependencies on CentOS systems, which uses yum/dnf package manager instead
correction_candidates: Before proceeding, install the following system packages: `sudo yum install -y rpm-build rpmdevtools golang git`.
Before proceeding, install the following system packages: `sudo dnf install rpm-build rpmdevtools golang git`.
Before proceeding, install the following system packages: `sudo yum groupinstall 'Development Tools' && sudo yum install golang git`.
Before proceeding, install the following system packages: `sudo yum install gcc make golang git rpm-devel`.
errors.golden_answer: Before proceeding, install the following system packages: `sudo yum install -y rpm-build rpmdevtools golang git`.

errors.error_description: Added '--verbose' flag to make command which is not a valid make option
